text: Arthur O'Connell (March 29, 1908 â€“ May 18, 1981) was an American stage, movie, television, voice, and radio actor. He was known for his roles in Citizen Kane, Operation Petticoat, Picnic, April Love, Bus Stop, The Hiding Place, and in Anatomy of Murder. O'Connell was born on March 29, 1908 in New York City, New York. He was married to Ann Hall Dunlop until they divorced in 1973. O'Connell died on May 18, 1981 from Alzheimer's disease in his Los Angeles, California home, aged 73. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1908 births Category:1981 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American radio actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Arthur O'Connell
